BeamCalc
Class Node

java.lang.Object
  BeamCalc.Node

public class Node
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains the definitions of every node in the structure, the integration algorithms and the equilibrium equations. Node visualisation is processed here.

Author:
Enrique Ramos
